Learning Journal

Modify separate keyboards independently on macOSmacos

2020/10/4

For example, if you have mapped caps lock to the escape key on a Macbook Pro keyboard, when you plug in an external Apple keyboard, you have to modify its caps lock key independently.

Responsive widths and heightscss

2020/9/27

Create a responsive element with a maximum width.

.sidebar {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 25rem;
}

Note: A width must be defined for the max-width to take effect.

Use the prefers-color-scheme media query to detect light or dark modecss

2020/9/25

@media (prefers-color-scheme: dark) {
  :root {
    --color-primary: white;
    --color-background: black;
  }
}

Reference: prefers-color-scheme

Reset an initial Git commitgit

2020/9/24

git update-ref -d HEAD

Force publish all files with Org-publish with prefix argumentemacs

2020/9/24

Org uses timestamps to track when a file has changed. The above functions normally only publish changed files. You can override this and force publishing of all files by giving a prefix argument to any of the commands above.

Example: `C-c org-publish`

Reference: Publishing (Org Mode Compact Guide)
